name: WordPress List Images to Optimize
author: Martin De Gregorio

sections.description: This plugins brings a list of the images under the uploads folder which will give the user an idea of which needs to be optimized or re-upload. In future editions i will add an optimize tool in order to make the tool more complete, but from this point it is very usefulll to know which resources could make the page slower than it should be.
sections.installation:
Install the plugin via the plugin directory, or by uploading the files manually to your server.

1) Upload the files to the /wp-content/plugins/wtoptimizeplugin/ directory or install through WordPress directly.

2) Activate the “WordPress List Images to Optimize” plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: This plugins brings a list of the images under the uploads folder which will give the user an idea of which needs to be optimized or re-upload.
